name: Orbital Mechanic
description:
The year is 3XXX. The human race has cut funding on project S. E. B. A. S. (Sexy and Extremely Beautiful Alpha Satellites). To cut back on costs, YOU are tasked with fixing all of these broken heart-breakers.

FLY AROUND

VISIT PLANETS

RETURN THESE HANDSOME SATELLITES TO THEIR FORMER GLORY.

BE THE ORBITAL MECHANIC.

Made by:

Alephlol - Lead project manager

Pozitronic - Story boarder and idea churner. Also goes by Sparrow.
Heerokazen - Mechanics and 5 Dan coder.

Criminal Doritos - Beginner pixel artist. Dolphin lover.
